attributes.background:
The Syrian refugee crisis is a massive blot on our conscience. As a compassionate nation we must help these fellow human beings. The current response is quite cringe worthy and shameful.

Petition name : Save Our Syrians SOS

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106509

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
